DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 study first clinical trial Japanese subject . This study design evaluate single- multiple-dose pharmacokinetics , safety tolerability PF-04171327 oral tablet healthy adult Japanese Western subject fast fed condition .
DOC.brief_title: PK And Safety Study Of PF-04171327 In Healthy Japanese And Western Subjects In Fasting And Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject non childbearing potential age 18 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 45 kg ( 99 lb ) . Japanese subject four Japanese grandparent born Japan . Confirmed fast glucose 100 mg/dL Screening Day 0 Cohort A B. Corticosteroid use 5 mg prednisone equivalent per day 6 week . Evidence history clinically significant hematological ( include anemia ) , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) .
